payContext.name: Pay money
payContext.description: Adds the option to pay a player money.

payDefault.name: Default pay amount
payDefault.description:
Specifies how much money will be paid by default. (You still have to press enter to send the command)
You can leave this blank

clanInviteContext.name: Send Clan Invite
clanInviteContext.description: Adds the option to send a clan invite to the player.

friendRequestContext.name: Send friend request
friendRequestContext.description: Adds the option to send a friend request to the player.

toasts.number: You have to enter a valid number!

chat.clickableNickname: Click, to see the real name.
